content: I worry that, because the Japanese lines in this site are written with furigana, they take up a lot of space, and the people who don't even care about them in the first place might find them annoying.
translations: ita:Temo che, per via che le linee giapponesi in questo sito sono scritte con il furigana, occupino un sacco di spazio, e le
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by marshmallowcat (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
